column4: hello, im a newbie and im tring for over 4 hours to install ubuntu 7.10 (stable) but without results... im booting with cd and choosing installation but it always freezes (same with v8 beta)
it seems that there is an incompatibility issue but how can i know the reason?
it doesnt give any message, just freezing at the logo and the progress bar
- try editing the kernel options at the boot screen - press f6 and remove "quiet splash" - then boot. You should see where and what is causing the install or boot to hang
